posts.title: Our Services
posts.content:
Mobile grooming salon for cats and dogs.

Book Appointment

Dog grooming

Our deluxe grooming service includes:

  • Nail clip
  • Ear cleaning
  • 1st shampoo
  • 2nd shampoo
  • Conditioning rinse
  • Towel dry
  • Blow dry
  • Brush out
  • And a treat!

Deluxe Cut and Groom

Our deluxe cut and groom package includes everything in the deluxe groom plus a haircut.

Add on services

Pamper your pup even more with one of our signature add on services:

  • Aloe conditioning treatment
  • Soothing medicated shampoos
  • Tooth brushing
  • Creative styling with temporary color
  • Nail polish application
  • Coat braiding
  • Bows and other accessories

posts.title: Now Booking Summer Sessions
posts.content:
“One must maintain a little bit of summer, even in the middle of winter.” – Henry David Thoreau
Blue skies and warm weather, what's not to love about summer? It's a great season for outdoor family portrait sessions and now is the time to book them! We offer a number of family portrait packages and for a limited time are offering 15% off packages booked before April 1. How to book Email us to set up a time to visit our studio.
